name: It's Just a Dream (McLovinlov)
description:
It's Just a Dream

Instructions: use A (left) and D (right) keys to move and SPACEBAR to jump, double-jump or triple-jump.

Main modifications:

  1. New skins for main character.
  2. Player swap script and prefab for changing character when needed (3 characters in total with different attributes).
  3. Triggers for changing level layout, gameobjects, music and skybox.
  4. Changed all in-game Music and many sound effects.
  5. Worked with skybox for background.
  6. Used a new tile mapping.
  7. Created bouncy platforms.
  8. Created exploding platforms.
  9. New main menu skin.
  10.  Changed gameplay , you play in a single level which evolves over time.
  11. Added some puzzle mechanics where you have to find your way.
  12. Added a scripted event.
  13. Added a Boss fight at the end with triggers to:
    1. change music
    2. spawn minions.
    3. instantiate explosions

Most of the free assets (sound effect, music, tile, sprites, animations) were downloaded from opengameart.org.

Created by Pavel (March 2021)
